snippet: Do you have a question about Truvada? Or the new recommendation that all Americans at high risk for H.I.V. take this drug? Ask Well. Your question may be answered by our reporter, Donald G. McNeil, Jr.
lead_paragraph: Do you have a question about Truvada? Or the new recommendation that all Americans at high risk for H.I.V. take this drug? Ask Well. Your question may be answered by our reporter, Donald G. McNeil, Jr.
